message: I know this is a really ostentatious suggestion... but I've been using the site since launch at least 6 times a day. I find myself rolling over the groups dropdown, to find out what has been said every time I load the site. It's the easiest way to "check my inbox" as it were. I don't use any of the links on the left sidebar, except the recent topics box is very useful. Perhaps it could be pushed down. Anyway, it's just a suggestion. Love the app, I'll be using it more and more.
+1 from me. I also use the groups dropdown as my main navigational aid.
